attributes.additional_details:
Many people are suffering mentally and financially , we cannot wait for a vaccine as we do not know how long this will take, we cannot jeopardise our lives until a cure is not found! 
Covid -19 will linger  in the air for a long time, we cannot keep our children at home, or stay off work for a longer period as this isn't making sense anymore, many businesses are opening themselves due to Govt not taking any clear action , Ease Lockdown in The  UK Now!!
attributes.background: Govt needs to take action now and ease lockdown as many many businesses are suffering and the economy needs to be restarted ,
